content: crochet fingerless gloves chloe bogardus - materials r6 chain 1 half_double_crochet in each st in the round join - 4 4 5 or 5 mm crochet hook for small medium or large sizes r7 chain 1 2 half_double_crochet in first st half_double_crochet in next 7 sts 2 half_double_crochet in next st half_double_crochet until end of - worsted weight yarn approx 50 - 70 grams depending on material round join - ° ° ° ° ° ° ° ° ° ° ° ° ° ° ° ° ° ° ° ° ° ° ° ° ° ° ° ° ° ° ° ° ° ° ° ° ° ° ° ° ° ° ° ° ° ° ° ° ° ° ° ° ° ° ° ° ° ° r8 chain 1 half_double_crochet in each st in the round join - wrist ribbing r9 ch1 half_double_crochet in 1st st skip 9 sts half_double_crochet in next st until end of round join chain 11 half_double_crochet in second chain from hook across row 10 half_double_crochet r10-14 ch1 half_double_crochet in each st join more row can be added or omitted here chain 1 half_double_crochet across in blo 10 half_double_crochet across each row for desired length repeat until you have 16 row of half_double_crochet or the cuff fits your wrist snugly fasten_off and weave in all ends seam up along the edge using a slip_stitch to join in the round turn cuff inside out - glove body appliqués or needle round 1 chain 1 single_crochet 24 - 28 stitches evenly across the cuff join felted shapes can be r2 chain 1 half_double_crochet in each st in the round join added to the cuff r3 chain 1 2 half_double_crochet in first st half_double_crochet next 2 sts 2 half_double_crochet in next st half_double_crochet in each st until tag me on instagram so that end of round join i can see your gloves r4 chain 1 half_double_crochet in each st join r5 chain 1 2 half_double_crochet in first st half_double_crochet in next 4 sts 2 half_double_crochet in next st half_double_crochet until end of round join
